modName: Armorless Dark Brotherhood and Nightingale armor for the fashionable mage
summary: A simple mod made by request. I put it up here for simple installation and figured I had no reason to hide it. Do as you want.  Shouldn't be any trouble or such. Might affect NPCs and might not work with other mods also modifying these armors.
descriptionHtml: A simple mod made by request: Simply makes Dark Brotherhood and Nightingale armor have 0 armor and count as clothing, for the fashionable mages out there. I put it up here for simple installation and figured I had no reason to hide it. Do as you want. Shouldn't be any trouble or such. Might affect NPCs and might not work with other mods also modifying these armors.
author: Darkshied
